panels.description:
Data starts 2021-04-10T2000Z

New players will be artifically inflated to prevent alerts
panels.title: Players total time online (15s/i)

panels.description:
Data starts 2021-04-10T2000Z

New players will be artificially inflated to prevent alerts

targets.expr:
sort_desc(min(time() - max_over_time(timestamp(changes(mc_player_online{container=~"$container"}[5m]) > 0)[45d:1m])) without (instance, pod, service, container, job))
unless avg_over_time(mc_player_online{container=~"$container"}[45d]) == 0

panels.title: Players time since last login (45d)

targets.expr:
min(time() - max_over_time(timestamp(changes(mc_player_online{container="minecraft-survival-minecraft"}[5m]) > 0)[60d:1m])) without (instance, pod, service, container, job)
unless avg_over_time(mc_player_online{container="minecraft-survival-minecraft"}[60d]) == 0
